Posts.Content: Apr 19, 2012 01:46AM Fyve wrote: Hi, there This is my first time on the forum. I was REALLY nervous prior to my U/S guided core needle biopsy, but it was relatively painless. Went to work and all was well! Both the doctor and tech were extremely gracious and spent time talking me through each step prior to actually doing it. There was a brief moment when the lidocaine seemed to be wearing off - I mentioned it and more was immediately injected. If I had had one of those "EASY" buttons - is it from Staples? - I would have used it!
Posts.Title: U/S guided core needle biopsy? Shachar Shachar
